publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7007 Jim Hume: Congratulations to the Park Family of Drinkstone on Winning the Future Farmer Award 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Arnold Park of Drinkstone, near Hawick, his son, John, and his family on winning the Future Farmer Award 2010; notes that the judges recognised the Parks’ strong environmental ethos and high quality grassland management, and further acknowledges their success in gaining the highest recorded gigot score with their ram, Drinkstone Punt Fun.
